titleStmt.title: As you were: or A posture of peace: presenting to your view the broken state of the kingdom, as it now stands, with a good way to rally it to its former happiness. With some remarkable passages of late agitation.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Ezekias, 1590-1675.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Ezekias Woodward by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
